Translations.Text: avaru nirmala manas'sinondige tam'ma odeyana sannidhige bandaru
Mattu avaru tam'ma tande hagu tam'ma janangadavarodane kelidaru; ‘‘nivu adenannu pujisuttiruviri?’’
‘‘Nivenu, allahana jote mithya saktigalannu devaragisalu bayasuvira?’’
‘‘Ella lokagala odeyana kuritu nim'ma abhiprayavenu?’’
A balika avaru naksatragaledege drsti biridaru
mattu nanu asvasthanagi bittiddene endaru
avarella (janangadavarella) avarannu (ibrahimarannu) bittu horatu hodaru
avaru (ibrahimaru) avara (tam'ma janangadavara) devarugaledege (vigrahagaledege) gamana harisidaru mattu kelidaru; ‘‘nivu enannu tinnuvudillave?’’
‘‘Nimagenagide? Niveke matanaduttilla?’’
Konege avaru avugala mele mugibiddu balavagi hodedaru
avarella (janangadavarella) avaredege dhavisi bandaru
avaru (ibrahimaru helidaru;) ‘‘nivenu, svatah nive ketti nirmisidavugalannu pujisuttira?’’
‘‘Nim'mannu mattu nivu racisuvavugalannella allahane srstisiruvanu’’
avaru (janangadavaru, paraspararodane) ‘‘avanigagi ondu agni kundavannu racisiri mattu avanannu benkigesedu bidiri’’ endaru
avaru (janangadavaru), avarige hani mada bayasiddaru. Adare navu avarannu kilagisibittevu
avaru (ibrahim) helidaru; nanu nanna odeyanedege teraluttene. Avanu nanage saridariyannu torabahudu
‘‘nannodeya, nanage srestha santatigalannu daya palisu’’ (endu avaru prarthisidaru)
konege navu avarige obba vivekavanta putrana (isma'ilara) subhavarte nididevu

Avaru (isma'ilaru) avara jote odadaballavaradaga avaru helidaru; ‘‘nanu ninna koralu koyyuttiruvudagi svapnadalli kandiddene. I kuritu ninna anisike enu?’’ Avaru (isma'il) helidaru; ‘‘appa, nimage adesisalagiruvudannu nivu madibidi. Allahanicchisidare, nivu nannannu sahanasilanagi kanuviri’’
hige avaribbaru vidheyate toridaru mattu avaru (ibrahimaru) avarannu (putranannu), mukha kelagagisi malagisidaru
aga navu avarannu karedevu; ‘‘ibrahimare,’’
‘‘nivu svapnavannu sakaragolisidiri’’. Navu sajjanarannu khandita ide riti puraskarisutteve
adu khandita ondu spasta parikseyagittu
navu avarige (balidanakkagi) ondu maha balipasuvannu nididevu
mattu navu adara (a ghataneya) nenapannu mundinavaralli ulisidevu
ibrahimarige santi
navu sajjanarannu ide riti puraskarisutteve
avaru nam'ma visvasi dasarallobbaragiddaru
munde navu avarige is‌hak‌ra subha varteyannu nididevu. Avarobba sajjana devadutaragiddaru
navu avarigu is‌hakarigu samrd'dhiyannu nididevu. Avaribbara santatigalalli sajjanaru iddaru, svatah tam'ma mele spasta akramavesagidavaru iddare
navu musa mattu harunara mele krpe toridevu
mattu navu avaribbarannu avara janangadavarannu maha sankatadinda vimocisidevu
navu avarige neravadevu. Addarinda avaru vijayigaladaru
navu avaribbarigu savistaravada granthavannu nididdevu
mattu navu avarige nera margavannu torisiddevu
mundinavaralli navu avara nenapannu ulisidevu
musa mattu harunarige santi sigali
navu sajjanarannu khandita ideriti puraskarisutteve
avaribbaru nam'ma visvasi dasaragiddaru
mattu ilyas khandita devadutarallobbaragiddaru
Avaru tam'ma janangadavarodane helidaru; ‘‘nivenu (allahanige) anjuvudillave?’’
‘‘Nivenu ‘ba'al‌’ devige more iduttira? Mattu sarva srestha srstikartanannu bittu biduttira?’’
‘‘Allahane nim'ma odeyanu haudu nim'ma purvajara odeyanu haudu’’
avaru (janangadavaru) avarannu tiraskarisidaru. Avarannu khandita (siksegagi) hajaru padisalaguvudu
allahana ayda dasara horatu
avara (ilyasara) nenapannu navu mundinavaralli ulisiruvevu
ilyas‌rige santi sigali
navu khandita sajjanarannu ide riti puraskarisutteve
avaru khandita nam'ma visvasi dasarallobbaragiddaru
innu lutaru khandita nam'ma dutarallobbaragiddaru
navu avarannu hagu avara maneyavarannella raksisidevu
hinde ulidukonda obba vrd'dheya horatu
(avara janangada) itararannu navu nasa madibittevu
nivantu avara (nadugala) melindale hadu hoguttiri – hagalalli –
mattu irulalli. Nivenu alocisuvudillave
yunus khandita nam'ma dutarallobbaragiddaru
avaru tam'ma tumbida hadaginedege dhavisidaru
(hadagu muluguva hantadalli) avaru (adrstada) citi ettuvudakke oppidaru mattu sotu hodaru
konege (samudrakkeseyalada) avarannu minu nungitu. Aga avaru tam'manne dusisikondaru
ondu vele avaru allahana pavitravannu japisuttiruvavaragade iddiddare
punarut'thanada dinadavaregu avaru adara (minina) hotteyalle uliyuttiddaru
konege navu avarannu bayalige esedu bittevu. Aga avaru tumba ksinaragiddaru
